{{Missing information|Baby variants.}}
A '''mob variant''' is an alternate appearance or a breed to a [[Mob|mob]], typically without altering their basic properties. Below is a semi-comprehensive list of typical mob variants.

==Related mobs==
Some mobs are based off of other mobs.
